messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] L & L Conference Family Reg. Available
messages.msgSnippet: Live and Learn Unschooling Conference is in Black Mountain, NC HSC is in Sacramento, CA Rethinking Education is in Dallas, TX. There s also LIFEisGood in
messages.messageBody:
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference is in Black Mountain, NC

HSC is in Sacramento, CA

Rethinking Education is in Dallas, TX.

There's also LIFEisGood in Corvallis, OR (I think next year's is in
Eugene?) and the NEConference in Peabody, MA, and LivingJoyfully in
Toronto, Canada, and Love to Learn in Hickory,NC.

Minnesota is hosting one this fall, and Costa Rica is planning one next
winter.

Robin's selling a family registration to Live and Learn.

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

-----Original Message-----
From: Kidgie@...

In a message dated 7/12/2007 1:11:33 A.M. Pacific Daylight Time,
ohpurple1@... writes:

We registered for the conference and will be unable to attend. If
anyone is

interested in a family registration (we paid the early bird rate)
please let
me know. I'd be thrilled to get $200.00 for it -- it's 350.00 if you
register
now.

Thanks,
Robin


Robin, is this the one in Sacramento?

Karen
